item.title: Instacart 推出 "Fizz "酒类订购应用程序，瞄准 Z 世代用户
item.description: Instacart 正在推出一款全新的、面向年轻一代的应用程序，用于集体订购饮料和聚会小吃，从而将其核心配送业务扩展到杂货之外。【原文：Instacart is launching a new, Gen-Z focused app for group orders of drinks and party snacks, expanding its core delivery business beyond grocery hauls.】

item.title: 米尔肯研究所全球会议的最新情况
item.description: 在加利福尼亚州比佛利山庄举行的米尔肯研究所全球会议期间，演讲者参加小组讨论。摄影师：Lauren Justice/Bloomberg【原文：Speakers participate in a panel discussion during the Milken Institute Global Conference in Beverly Hills, California. Photographer: Lauren Justice/Bloomberg】

item.title: 美国贸易赤字因关税前进口激增而扩大至创纪录水平
item.description: 由于特朗普政府准备全面征收关税，企业急于进口产品，美国 3 月份的贸易赤字扩大至创纪录水平。【原文：The US trade deficit widened to a record in March as companies rushed to import products as the Trump administration readied sweeping tariffs.】

item.title: 加征关税后加拿大对美商品出口创五年来最大降幅
item.description: 就在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）准备在华盛顿举行会谈之际，加拿大对美国的出口急剧下降，而对其他国家的出口则大幅增长，这凸显出贸易流动正受到关税的影响。【原文：Canadian exports to the US tumbled while shipments to other countries soared, underscoring that trade flows are being shaped by tariffs just as President Donald Trump and Prime Minister Mark Carney prepare to meet in Washington.】

item.title: 特朗普时代的削减与哈佛之争威胁生物技术公司最冒险的赌注
item.description: 特朗普政府大刀阔斧地削减联邦研究经费以及与哈佛大学的争斗，有可能导致风险资本市场失血，从而抑制早期药物开发的融资机会。【原文：The Trump administration’s sweeping cuts of federal research funding and its fight with Harvard University risk bleeding into the venture capital market, curbing financing opportunities for early-stage drug development.】

item.title: General Catalyst 公司联合领投人工智能融资交易，Parloa 公司估值 10 亿美元
item.description: Parloa GmbH 是一家为客户服务建立人工智能平台的初创公司，该公司已从投资者处融资 1.2 亿美元，交易价值达 10 亿美元。【原文：Parloa GmbH, a startup building an artificial intelligence platform for customer service, has raised $120 million from investors in a deal that values the company at $1 billion.】

item.title: 贸易战动荡掩盖了中国的长期金属需求
item.description:
随着最大的大宗商品消费国进入工业活动的高峰期，是时候进行总结了。【原文：

As the largest commodities consumer enters the peak period of industrial activity, it’s time to take stock.

】

item.title: 在贸易不确定性的影响下，ADM 利润降至 2020 年以来最低点
item.description: 由于贸易和生物燃料政策的不确定性增加，农作物交易市场变得更加复杂，Archer-Daniels-Midland 公司的盈利缩水至大流行病以来的最低水平。【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co.’s earnings shrunk to the lowest level since the pandemic as a difficult crop trading market is complicated by mounting trade and biofuel policy uncertainty.】

item.title: 台币为何升值，谁从中受益？
item.description: 5 月初的两天里，台湾货币兑美元汇率跳升了 6.2%，这在台湾岛汇率通常稳定的情况下几乎是史无前例的。【原文：Taiwan’s currency jumped 6.2% against the US dollar over two days at the start of May, an almost unprecedented move given the island’s normally stable exchange rates.】

item.title: 以太坊的最新升级对提振价格作用不大
item.description: 软件开发人员正在为以太坊区块链的又一次升级做准备，目的是使以太坊网络在与 Solana 等后起之秀的竞争中更具竞争力。【原文：Software developers are readying the Ethereum blockchain for yet another upgrade that aims to make the network more competitive with upstart rivals such as Solana.】

item.title: 美国和欧盟打击大型科技公司对苹果、谷歌和 X 意味着什么？
item.description: 多年来，全球最大的科技公司在很大程度上能够抵制政府的监督。这种情况正在迅速改变。【原文：For years, the world’s biggest technology companies were largely able to resist government oversight. That’s changing fast.】

item.title: 如果谈判失败，欧盟将对1000亿欧元美国商品征收关税
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，如果正在进行的贸易谈判未能取得令欧盟满意的结果，欧盟计划对约1000亿欧元（约合1130亿美元）的美国商品征收额外关税。【原文：The European Union plans to hit about €100 billion ($113 billion) in US goods with additional tariffs in the event ongoing trade talks fail to yield a satisfactory result for the bloc, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 关税不确定性掩盖了科技公司强劲的盈利业绩
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，我们的每日时事通讯由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，伊恩-金（Ian King）报道说，除了对美国关税升级成本的困惑之外，科技公司的季度业绩还算不错。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ian King reports that tech’s quarterly results have been pretty good other than the confusion over the costs of escalating US tariffs.】

item.title: DoorDash 以 12 亿美元收购 SevenRooms，押注餐饮技术发展
item.description: DoorDash 公司将以 12 亿美元的价格收购酒店技术公司 SevenRooms Inc.【原文：DoorDash Inc. is buying hospitality tech company SevenRooms Inc. for $1.2 billion, hours after confirming its plans to acquire London-based delivery Deliveroo Plc, underscoring its appetite for aggressive global expansion.】

item.title: 特朗普的中东之行让卡塔尔准备订购波音飞机
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的中东之行将带他回到一个在他第一任期内为美国提供巨额投资的地区。现在，沙特阿拉伯、卡塔尔和阿拉伯联合酋长国正凭借其航空和国防工业瞄准更高的目标，将商业交易转化为政治资本。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s Middle East trip will take him back to a region that made huge investments in the US in his first term. Now Saudi Arabia, Qatar and the United Arab Emirates are aiming even higher with their aviation and defense industries to turn commercial deals into political capital.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易战仅一艘船的代价
item.description: 4 月 24 日，东方海外紫罗兰号（OOCL Violet）满载着数千个装满货物的集装箱驶入长滩港，用一艘船讲述了唐纳德-特朗普总统贸易战的故事。【原文：The OOCL Violet, a hulking shipping vessel that pulled into the Port of Long Beach on April 24, loaded with thousands of containers full of goods bound for the US, tells the story of President Donald Trump’s trade war in one ship.】

item.title: 贝森特在称赞美元的作用时引用了博弈论专家的话
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂（Chris Anstey），波士顿的经济学编辑，今天我们暂时搁置美联储周分析，来看看关于美国资产全球吸引力的辩论。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston, and today we’re putting Fed-week analysis on pause for the moment to look at the debate on the global appeal of US assets. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 晨星现在将揭露乏善可陈的私人投资
item.description: 晨星公司多年来一直在为普通投资者的股票和债券基金评级。现在，它将向面向大众的流动性较低的私人资产基金颁发金、银、铜牌。【原文：Morningstar Inc. has been rating stock and bond funds for everyday investors for years. Now it will award gold, silver and bronze medals to less-liquid private asset funds marketed to the masses.】

item.title: 无法承受的数字受关税影响的公司再次涨价
item.description: 今年，Theragun 按摩器的最佳优惠不会出现在圣诞节。【原文：This year, the best deals on Theragun massagers won’t come at Christmas.】

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德公司将动用 1,190 亿美元战备资金，利用市场混乱局面
item.description: 布鲁克菲尔德资产管理公司（Brookfield Asset Management）表示，该公司计划利用近期全球市场的波动，将其 1 190 亿美元未催缴资本中的一部分用于购买优质资产。【原文：Brookfield Asset Management said it plans to take advantage of the recent volatility in global markets by deploying some of its $119 billion of uncalled capital to pick up high-quality assets.】

item.title: 高利润后欧洲央行压力测试将减少对银行资本的冲击
item.description: 目前对欧洲最大银行进行的压力测试对资本比率的影响将小于上一次，这在一定程度上反映了该行业去年强劲的盈利能力。【原文：The current stress test on Europe’s biggest banks is on track to delivering a lesser hit to capital ratios than the previous one, partly reflecting the sector’s strong profitability last year.】

item.title: 亚洲感受到美元暴跌的连锁反应
item.description:
中国政府反对人民币升值，帮助亚洲货币市场恢复平静。【原文：

Beijing pushes back against letting the yuan strengthen, helping restore calm to Asian currency markets. 

】

item.title: 加拿大人改飞其他国家，西捷航空九条美国夏季航线停航
item.description: 由于需求下降，WestJet 将暂停加拿大和美国之间的九条航线。【原文：WestJet is suspending nine routes between Canada and the US due to lower demand.】

item.title: 博雅银行交易主管称美国市场的转移仍微不足道
item.description: 美国银行欧洲、中东和非洲市场主管表示，最近对欧洲的兴趣激增并不一定是长期结构性转变的开始。【原文：Bank of America Corp.’s head of EMEA markets says the recent surge of interest in Europe isn’t necessarily the start of a long-lasting, structural shift.】

item.title: 卡塔尔借力体育提前实现 2030 年旅游目标
item.description: 卡塔尔斥资数十亿美元筹备 2022 年世界杯足球赛，赌的就是全球瞩目将引发持久的旅游业繁荣。三年过去了，这场豪赌似乎得到了回报。【原文：Qatar spent billions of dollars preparing for the 2022 World Cup, betting that the global spotlight would spark a lasting tourism boom. Three years on, that gamble appears to be paying off.】

item.title: 习近平抨击美国，敦促欧盟联手反对单边主义
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平呼吁欧盟领导人与中国站在一起反对单边主义，这是对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普颠覆全球世界秩序努力的含蓄斥责。【原文：China’s President Xi Jinping has called on European Union leaders to stand with it against unilateralism, in a veiled rebuke to US President Donald Trump’s efforts to upend the global world order.】

item.title: Coloplast 辞退首席执行官，寻求恢复投资者信任
item.description: Coloplast A/S 公司解雇了首席执行官，以恢复投资者的信心，因为这家医疗设备制造商未能为股东带来足够的回报。【原文：Coloplast A/S fired its chief executive officer to restore investor confidence after the medical equipment maker failed to deliver sufficient shareholder returns.】

item.title: 英伟达财报发布前，AMD和Arm提供了了解人工智能领域的窗口
item.description: 在 Nvidia 公司发布财报前几周，两家芯片制造商将在未来几天发布财报，让投资者了解人工智能基础设施的需求状况。【原文：Two chipmakers reporting earnings in the coming days will give investors insight into how demand for artificial intelligence infrastructure is holding up a few weeks ahead of Nvidia Corp.’s results.】

item.title: 挪威房价九个月来首次下跌
item.description: 在推迟货币宽松政策以及全球贸易忧虑导致消费者情绪恶化之后，挪威调整后的房价出现了九个月来的首次下跌。【原文：Norway’s adjusted home prices fell for the first time in nine months after a delay in monetary easing and a worsening of consumer sentiment amid worries over global trade.】

item.title: Grubhub 所有者 Wonder 在新一轮融资中估值突破 70 亿美元
item.description:
马克-罗尔（Marc Lore）的美食馆初创公司正在向包括 NEA、Accel 和 GV 在内的投资者募集 6 亿美元资金。【原文：

Marc Lore’s food hall startup is raising $600 million from investors including NEA, Accel and GV.

】
